protocol.name: P-GSE64253-1
protocol.text: Data was MAS5 normalized. ID_REF =  VALUE = MAS5 expression levels (scaling factor of 250)

protocol.name: P-GSE64253-2
protocol.text: Protoplasts were sorted directly into RNA extraction buffer.

protocol.name: P-GSE64253-3
protocol.text: Seeds were sterilized in 50% Chlorox and 1-2 drops of 10% Tween-20, imbibed at 4ºC in the dark in sterile water for 2-3 days, and germinated on plates containing 0.5X Murashige and Skoog (MS) salt mixture (Sigma) supplemented with 1% sucrose and 0.5 g/L 2-(N-morpholino) ethane-sulfonic acid (MES) pH 5.7-5.8 in 1% agar. Plates were incubated in a near vertical position at 22ºC and 70% humidity in a cycle of 18 hour light/6 hour dark.

protocol.name: P-GSE64253-4
protocol.text: RNA was extracted using the RNeasy Micro Kit with DNase treatment according to the instructions of the manufacturer (Qiagen). RNA quality and quantity were assessed using the Bioanalyzer (Agilent Technologies).

protocol.name: P-GSE64253-5
protocol.text: RNA was amplified and labeled using the WT-Ovation Pico RNA Amplification System and FL-Ovation cDNA Biotin Module V2, respectively (NuGEN Technologies).

protocol.name: P-GSE64253-6
protocol.text: Labeled cDNA was hybridized on an Arabidopsis full-genome ATH-121501 microarray using a Hybridization Control Kit and GeneChip Hybridization, Wash, and Stain Kit on a GeneChip Fluidics Station 450 (Affymetrix), according to manufacturer protocols.

protocol.name: P-GSE64253-7
protocol.text: Chips were scanned using a GeneChip Scanner (Affymetrix) according to manufacturer protocols.
